content.text: Ikkaku is the only female member of the Heart Pirates. Her name was revealed in SBS Volume 83.

Ikkaku is a woman with curly dark brown hair and light brown eyes, she is wearing a yellow and orange hat. Like all the other members of the Heart Pirates, she wears a boiler suit with the crew's Jolly Roger imprinted on the left breast.
Along with Uni and Clione, Ikkaku was against the idea of allying with the Straw Hat Pirates, thinking of their assistance as worthless.

A month before Trafalgar Law formed an alliance with the Straw Hat Pirates, Ikkaku and the other Heart Pirates went to Zou and were left under the watch of Nekomamushi. Ikkaku, Uni, and Clione were against forming the alliance, but they were outvoted.
When the Beasts Pirates, led by Jack, invaded Zou in search for Raizo, the Heart Pirates fought alongside the Mink Tribe.
After Law arrived at Zou around a week later, the Heart Pirates happily reunited with their captain when he came into the Whale Forest.

That night, the Heart Pirates briefly met and greet Monkey D. Luffy before Law went to have a private conversation with the Straw Hats. The Guardians later threw a party for the Straw Hats that lasted throughout the night, which the Heart Pirates joined in.
The next day, the Heart Pirates, some of the Straw Hats, Kin'emon, Kanjuro, and Raizo prepared to depart Zou for Wano Country on the Polar Tang.
The Heart Pirates later infiltrated Wano Country. After Law was captured to free Bepo, Shachi, and Penguin, the Heart Pirates gathered in Ebisu Town and discussed about their captain's situation.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 81 Chapter 810 (p. 12) and Episode 757, Ikkaku is first seen.
↑  SBS One Piece Manga — Vol. 83 (p. 42), Ikkaku's name is revealed.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 70 Chapter 700 (p. 10) and Episode 629, Law confirm the Heart Pirates whereabouts.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 81 Chapter 810 (p. 14) and Episode 759, The Heart Pirates status while on Zou is revealed.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 81 Chapter 807 (p. 15) and Episode 757, Law and the Heart Pirates reunite.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 82 Chapter 822 (p. 5) and Episode 776, The Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance divided.
